text: Mr. Osamu Suzuki was conferred the Padma Vibhushan (posthumously) for his remarkable contribution to the field of Trade & Industry. A visionary leader, he played a crucial role in making car ownership accessible to the Indian middle class and the emergence of India as a major car producing nation in the world. Mr. Toshihiro Suzuki, Representative Director and President, Suzuki Motor Corporation, received the Padma Vibhushan on behalf of his father, Mr. Osamu Suzuki from Hon’ble President of India Smt. Droupadi Murmu at Rashtrapati Bhavan. Through a heartfelt message, he expresses his deepest gratitude to the Government of India and the people of India for bestowing this great honour on Mr. Osamu Suzuki.  #PresidentofIndia #PMOIndia #PadmaAwards #MinistryofHomeAffairs #GovernmentofIndia #MyGovIndia #MarutiSuzuki #PadmaVibhushan #PadmaAwards #OsamuSuzuki #IndiaJapan #MakeinIndia #IndiaOnWheels #MobilityForAll

Proud moment! #MadeInIndia 5-Door Jimny debuts in Japan. Exclusively made at Gurugram plant & exported to ~100 countries Jimny is #MarutiSuzuki's 2nd most exported model in FY24-25. Reaffirms MSIL's commitment to 'Make-in-India for the world'.

We thank the Hon’ble Prime Minister Shri Narendra Modi for gracing the Maruti Suzuki Pavillion at the Bharat Mobility Global Expo 2025 to witness the first Global EV model from Suzuki Motor Corporation, the e VITARA. An iconic moment for all of us at Maruti Suzuki!  The e VITARA is a perfect tribute to Prime Minister’s vision of ‘Make in India. Make for the World’. The e VITARA will be manufactured exclusively in India for Indian customers and will be exported to 100 countries of the world. A true symbol of India’s manufacturing prowess, the e VITARA realizes Hon’ble PM’s vision for the Indian automotive industry to be ‘fantastic’ and ‘future ready’. The e VITARA is powered with our vision of ‘e for me’, where we are committed to providing Electric Eco-solutions for every customer. Together, we aim to pave the way for a greener, more sustainable future and showcase India’s manufacturing excellence on the global stage.   #eVITARA #BharatMobility #BharatMobilityGlobalExpo2025 #BharatEMobility #MobilityReimagined #AatmanirbharBharat #MakeinIndia #ViksitBharat Narendra Modi

#ExportMilestone: 3 million cumulative exports and growing. We achieved our 1st million in 24yrs 8months, our next million in 8yr 10months & now the 3 Million mark in just 3yr 9months, making it our fastest million in exports. Maruti Suzuki’s success in international markets is due to high acceptance of MSIL's global standard for quality, safety, design & tech.   The achievement represents India’s automobile manufacturing excellence on global stage. We thank the progressive policies of the Government of India for fueling this growth.  #ViksitBharat #MakeInIndia

Exciting News! Maruti Suzuki India Ltd recently hosted an impactful two-day 'Promotion and Role Change Workshop' at the prestigious Management Development Institute, Gurgaon. This event, held on May 9 and 10, was tailored for our newly promoted Deputy General Managers, preparing them with advanced leadership skills. The workshop began with an energizing keynote by Sanjiv Sinha, who encouraged our leaders to embrace innovation, think strategically, and lead with integrity. He emphasized the importance of fostering a culture of innovation and setting exemplary standards for respective teams. The highlight was a captivating session by Randhir Singh Kalsi, who shared his extensive experience and insights on navigating the fast-paced changes in the automotive industry. He explored emerging trends, effective change management, and the art of leading across generations, providing a comprehensive roadmap for future success. Success stories of the startups nurtured by him, with consistent focus on Customer centricity, were captivating for the participants. Feedback from participants was overwhelmingly positive! They were particularly inspired by the real-world stories shared by Mr. Kalsi, which added immense value to the learning experience. We are confident that this workshop has equipped our leaders with the critical skills and insights needed to drive Maruti Suzuki forward in the dynamic automotive landscape.  #marutisuzuki #MDIGurgaon #leadershipdevelopment #changemanagement #innovationculture

We are thrilled to share that Maruti Suzuki India Ltd. recently organized a ‘Promotion and Role Change Workshop’ in collaboration with ISB Executive Education. This three-day residential workshop, held from May 15 to 17, 2024, was designed to enhance leadership competencies, mainly Transformational leadership, Strategic thinking, and Business model innovation, among our recently promoted Vice Presidents and Executive Vice Presidents. The workshop was inaugurated with inspiring addresses from Mr. Randhir Singh Kalsi and Mr. Sanjiv Sinha Mr. Sinha emphasized the importance of creating the right culture at MSIL and urged participants to embody the principles of Creation, Operational Excellence, and Innovation in their roles. Mr. Kalsi shared his invaluable experience and insights, encouraging participants to adopt the mindset of innovation, along-with the existing Kaizen approach; for achieving significant growth. He highlighted the necessity of transforming from managers to true leaders who foster an innovation culture within the organization. Participants were enthusiastic about revisiting the journey of Maruti Suzuki from scratch and discussing the story of conceptualizing different Channels, Value Added Services and developing them into profitable businesses. The workshop received excellent feedback for its content, delivery, and the unique opportunity it provided, for networking and collaboration. We are confident that this workshop by one of India’s leading B-Schools, has equipped our efficient leaders with the leadership mindset to drive Maruti Suzuki to new heights in this dynamic environment.  #marutisuzuki #ISBHyderabad #leadershipdevelopment #strategicthinking #innovation

We are excited to share that Maruti Suzuki India Ltd recently hosted a transformative two-day residential 'Promotion and Role Change Workshop' at Indian Institute of Management, Lucknow on May 8 and 9! This exclusive event was designed for our newly promoted General Managers, aiming to arm them with cutting-edge leadership skills. The workshop kicked off with an inspiring keynote by Sanjiv Sinha, who energized the room with his call for innovation, strategic thinking, and exemplary leadership. He underscored the importance of fostering a culture of innovation and being true role models. Adding to the excitement, Randhir Singh Kalsi captivated everyone with his vast experience and insights into the rapid changes within the automobile industry. He discussed emerging trends and the nuances of managing multiple generations in the workplace, providing a roadmap to navigate the dynamic, challenging and opportunity-filled automotive landscape in India.  The feedback was phenomenal! Participants were particularly inspired by the real-life stories shared by Mr. Kalsi, finding them incredibly motivating. We're confident that this workshop has empowered our leaders with the skills and insights needed to steer Maruti Suzuki to new heights in the ever-evolving automotive sector.  #marutisuzuki #iimlucknow #leadershipdevelopment #changemanagement #innovationculture

Next stop Japan: Draped in pristine white, the first consignment of 1,600+ Fronx vehicles has set sail for Japan’s Toyohashi port from Gujarat’s Pipavav port. Fronx is exclusively manufactured at MSIL’s Gujarat plant.  #MarutiSuzuki is the leading passenger vehicle exporter with a 42%* share in the exports of passenger vehicles from the country. Maruti Suzuki exported a record 70,560 units in Q1 FY 2024-25, the highest ever in any Q1 of the company.  #MakeInIndia  (*Source: SIAM report)

"India can achieve its Carbon Neutrality goals and oil import reduction much faster if it encourages all clean technologies for mobility."  ~ Mr Rahul Bharti, Executive Director, Maruti Suzuki India Limited at the 6th Edition of the Conference on Future of Mobility in India in Gurugram  Sponsors SKF Group | Asahi India Glass Limited (AIS) | JK Tyre & Industries Ltd. | Avalon Consulting | Lucas TVS | MARK EXHAUST SYSTEMS LIMITED | Napino Auto & Electronics Ltd  #CII4NR CIIEvents #MobilityRevolution #SustainableMobility #CII #FutureOfTransportation #ElectricVehicles #AutonomousDriving

It fills us with immense pride to share that our flagship skill development initiative, Japan-India Institute for Manufacturing (JIM), a collaborative effort by the Govt of Japan & India, was recognized with the Award of Excellence under Skill Development & Livelihood initiative by Hon’ble Member of Parliament Smt Kamaljeet Sehrawat at 4th CSR Universe Social Impact Awards.   More than 1,700 students have been trained at JIMs in 10+ trades like Motor Vehicle Mechanic, Auto Body Painting Mechanic, Electrician, Welder, Fitter, Painter, etc. JIM emphasizes practical training on state-of-the-art simulators combined with theoretical education upskilling students with advanced manufacturing techniques and efficient shop-floor management practices based on Japanese manufacturing principles and soft skills.  Aligned with the Government of India’s flagship ‘Skill India’, the Company has 3 JIMs - two in Gujarat and one in Haryana dedicated to training youth and creating livelihood opportunities in the automobile industry.    To read more about the Japan-India Institute for Manufacturing, click here https://bit.ly/3XwG0HY  Ministry Of Heavy Industries

A proud moment for us! We thank FICCI and Hon’ble Minister Ministry of Road Transport and Highways Shri Nitin Gadkari for awarding us the prestigious FICCI Road Safety Awards 2024 for our breakthrough initiatives towards enhancing Road Safety. Maruti Suzuki won dual accolades at the awards towards  •	First-Aid Trauma Care Training for Drivers under the Healthcare Initiatives for Road Safety category. Under the initiative, 8,500 people, primarily commercial drivers have been trained to become First Responders during the ‘golden hour’ after accidents.  •	Automated Driving Test Tracks (ADTT) under the Initiatives/Interventions by Automobile Companies category. ADTTs have enabled automation of driving license testing using video analytics technology and zero human intervention. This ensures only skilled drivers get behind the wheel, making roads safer for all. Maruti Suzuki in partnership with Delhi govt has introduced 100% automation in driving license testing in the state.   Maruti Suzuki has been working extensively over the past two decades on Road Safety. The recognition inspires us to enhance our efforts in 5Es of Road Safety: Education, Engineering, Evaluation, Enforcement and Emergency care. #FICCI #FICCIRoadSafetyAwards  Ministry of Road Transport & Highways - India | Nitin Gadkari  | FICCI

Honoured to be conferred with Gold award by Hon’ble Chief Minister of Goa Dr. Pramod Sawant  at The CSR Times 11th National CSR Summit for our efforts in enabling Tertiary healthcare service through a Multi-Specialty Hospital at Sitapur, Gujarat.   The Multi-Specialty Hospital established in 2021, provides round-the-clock healthcare services such as General Medicine, Orthopaedics, Trauma, Gynaecology, Urology, Nephrology and Dialysis to residents of Becharaji, Mehsana, Mandal, Patan, Viramgam and nearby regions. Residents earlier had to travel long distances to avail such advanced clinical facilities. The hospital has helped treat over 100,000 patients since its inception and over 300 heart patients have benefited from advanced cardiac care with inauguration of a state-of-the-art Cath lab in 2023. As a symbol of quality healthcare provider, the hospital is accredited with NABH (National Accreditation Board for Hospitals & Healthcare providers) certification and conferred with gold quality certificate by the Quality Council of India  We are deeply humbled by the recognition of our healthcare efforts in Gujarat and remain committed to making a positive impact in communities through our CSR initiatives.   Jaxay Shah  | Rushikesh Patel   | Ministry of Health and Family Welfare, Government of India  | National Health Mission, Gujarat | Dr. Pramod Sawant | Quality Council of India(QCI) |

We at #MarutiSuzuki are humbled to receive 1) Gold award in the ‘COVID Public Health Warriors' category and  2) Silver Award for ‘Most Innovative CSR Project of the Year’ from Shri @AshwiniKChoubey, Hon’ble Ex-Union Minister of State at the #CSRHealthAwards 2024 by @IHWCouncil
